title: 2007-03-19 Cowboy Junkies @ Cafe de la Danse - Paris, France
description:
The 2007 tour was in support of their most recent CD, "at the end of paths taken." This release showcases a wide range of styles from the band, ranging from the quiet "Spiral Down" to the powerful "Mountain" to the soaring "Still Lost."

 

What truly sets this show apart is that it is from a mini-acoustic tour with just Mike, Margo and Jeff, so you get a chance to hear the songs done in a very reworked fashion.

 

One song from that album that is very different is "Cutting Board Blues," which on the CD is a full on rocker. Here it showcases Jeff&#039;s harmonica playing and Mike does some interesting things with the acoustic guitar to get a chunky rhythm going. "Still Lost" soars whether it has a full band playing. Just hearing Margo sing the opening lines is soothing.

You can decode the Lossless audio FLAC files into WAV files with your favorite decoder ( see http://flac.sourceforge.net/ ) then write them to a CD with no gaps between the tracks (i.e. Disk At Once) for a complete "Live" show.
